fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Full name:     
 LE TRUNG NGUYEN 
Date of birth:  
 25 April 1989 
Nationality:                  Vietnamese 
ID number:   
  024712215 
Permanent Address:   94A Duong Khue Street, Tan Phu District, HCMC 
PERSIONALITIES: 
✓ Being able to be self-motivated most of the time to ensure the best effort for every task 
✓ Trained to work under pressure with long hours, different time-zone and tight schedule 
✓ I value the importance of resilience and tenacity in both working and normal life to learn 
and develop more and more as well as not giving up easily milestones ahead 
✓ Being friendly and cheerful all the time to make sure a harmony environment around 
✓ A creative and innovative approach in most of tasks to ensure the productivity of the job 
✓ Listening skills to understand deeply the core of situation  
✓ Trust-worthy and mutual benefits are always highlight in interpersonal communication 
✓ Time management and tasks orientation are focused to be more productive in workplace 
EDUCATION 
❖ Undergraduate:  
o Bachelor of Commerce – RMIT International University 
o Major: Trading, Entrepreneurship, Management, Marketing 
❖ Postgraduate :  
o Master of Business Administration – Queen’s University Belfast, United Kingdom 
o Major: Leadership, Human Management, Problem-Solving 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
Digital Marketing Manager 
(07/2018 – Now) 
+Company: Nguyễn Hoàng Group (NHG) 
• Controlling the Facebook and Youtube channels of branding for 7 subsidiaries to making 
sure they are following the guildlines of the Corporation 
• Building the Youtube Channel of NHG to attract more views and subscribe by making 
Sitcom movies and Vblogs 
• Participating in implementing CRM and ERP to the Corporation to support Sales and 
marketing functions 
• Doing marketing research as well as controlling the Social-listening services from the 
Agency 
• Handling most Digital activies of the Corporation to make sure the best image of NHG to 
the publics 
• In charge in Digital activies of IEC (International Education City) of NHG such as 
building unique websites with special effects 
Marketing Manager 
(01/2016 – 06/2017) 
+Company: Duke English Academy  
• Assist the General Director on strategic plan for short and long-term plan on Sales and 
Marketing activities 
• Managing the digital marketing function such as Facebook, Youtube and other social 
media forms and analyse and give strategic approaches based on the date collected 
• Holding and creating traditional marketing activities included setting up events in public 
places (supermarket, schools and carnivals) and follow the effectiveness of activities to 
give critical recommendations 
•  Focusing on branding strategy to boost the brand to the top of the industry as well as 
building the quality to match with the position of the company in the marketplace  
• Researching and classing the niche and new market to target and avoid market obsolete  
• Approaching innovative activities to enhance the diversity in find and increasing the 
customers’ satisfaction and boost sales 
• Supporting and collaborating with other departments to ensure a better method will be 
implemented in each Marketing task as well as encourage the growth of the whole firm. 
Trade Marketing Executive 
(04/2016 – 08-2016) 
+Company: Kumon Organization 
• Designing innovative actions to boost sales and improve the customers’ awareness  
• Developing the market to the new segmentation and different areas 
• Dealing with suppliers to execute marketing activities such as hanging banner outdoors 
and public places, renting venues for events and annual activities 
• Taking main responsibilities of B2B channel in negotiating and collaborating with 
partners to implementing mutual cooperation between companies 
• Planning in details necessary steps and resources for holding events as well as allocating 
suitable human resources for sales activities during the event 
• Budgeting resources to ensure the minimization of the waste of financial usage 
Market Research and Strategic consultant  
(09/2014 – 1/2015) 
+ Company: PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC), UK  
• Communicating and building rapports with CEOs to conducting in-depth interviews 
• Executing a quantitative research to form an annual International Research of PwC 
• Conducting interviews to collect information and data about the current situation of the 
enterprises as well as the visions for the near future 
• Collecting and analyzing data from CEOs to form a critical multinational market research 
• Doing quantitative researches with local tourism businesses by relevant online tools 
• Collecting and analyzing the results to provide a broad view of the current situation 
• Working with big data, analyzing and organizing figures to identifying the real problems 
and burdens that made the slow business growth 
• Brainstorming and creating innovative solutions to provide both short and long term 
plans to improving the tourism industry of Northern Ireland, UK 
• Communicating and cooperating with Government agents to indicate burdens and 
milestones  
• Combining different researches and evidences to conduce elements of causes and effects 
to give an in-depth and diverse recommendations 
Business Development Executive  
(09/2011 – 02/2012) 
+Company: TRG International - Management Software solution for Business (B2B) 
• Working in IT solution providing industry (IT management system) 
• Arranging annual seminars and events with multiple tasks in charge 
• Following up clients on selling products and encouraging them to renew the contract 
• Consulting clients about the products of the companies by identifying their real 
requirements and giving necessary advices to ensure a happy agreement  
• Promoting products through relevant marketing activities such as designing newsletters, 
invitations and building up the brand images of the companies by affiliate marketing

educations.major: Quản lý đô thị và công trình

educations.major_categories: Khoa học giáo dục và đào tạo giáo viên
